description:
Available in: English

Earth is on the verge of war!

Recent deep-space scouting missions have stumbled on the Gryllus, an aggressive alien race. Several earth scouts have been brutally destroyed. We know next to nothing about the Gryllus. Your mission is to pilot your scout ship behind enemy lines. Scan Gryllus bases and spacecraft to gather intelligence. Defend yourself from hostile aliens.

Navigate through alien worlds, asteroid belts, and open space. Fight off drones and dangerous war machines. Use your mobile device's accelerometer and touch screen to control the quick, agile scout ship in this exciting adventure!

This is the full version of Brand Name Space Game, a new action arcade game.

The game's graphics & sounds are licensed from some very talented creative people using the Creative Commons Attribution License.  See the web site or the in-game Credits screen (accessible from the About screen) for details.

Changes in latest version:
* Runs on HP TouchPad.
* Bug fixes.
